import "./Post.scss"; import MoreVertIcon from "@mui/icons-material/MoreVert"; import { Users } from "../../DummyData.js"; import { useState } from "react"; function Post({ post }) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like); const [isliked, setisLiked] = useState(false); return (
u.id === post.userId)[0] .profilePicture } alt="" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post?.date} minutes ago
{post?.desc}
{like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
); } export default Post;
